string.name: name
string.value: An Evidence of Slaying the Captain
#b#p2092001##k of #b#m251000000##k seems to be thinking of eliminating #rRed-Nosed Pirates#k... maybe there's something I can do to help. I better go see #p2092001#.

#p2092001# suspects that #r#o7130104##k of the Red-Nosed Pirates is responsible for this mess. In order to help him out, I must find a way to eliminate #o7130104#... I better eliminate #o7130104# and bring #b#t4031436##k as evidence. \n\n#i4031436##t4031436# #b#c4031436##k/20

Once I showed #p2092001# #t4031436#, he seemed very ecstatic. To see a grown man be so ecstatic makes me feel equally as good. Hopefully this will in turn transport those herbs safely to #m250000000#.
#p2091002#님이 보내서 왔다고? 당신이 정말로 빨간코 해적단 소탕에 동참하겠다는 말이오? 빨간코 해적단은 오시리아 전체에 악명 높은 자들이오. 데비존은 물론이고 그 수하들도 상대하기 무척 어려울 텐데… 그래도 도울 생각이 있소?
자신만만하군. 좋소. 그렇다면 당신이 #o7130104#을 해치우고, 그의 #t4031436#을 가져와 주시오. 화물에 남은 흔적들로 보아, 이번 약탈의 주범은 크루이니. 그를 처치하고 그가 가지고 있던 #t4031436# 20개를 모아 오면 된다오.
당신과 함께 가고 싶지만, 자칫 그러는 동안 또 다시 마을의 화물이 약탈 당할지 모르니 그럴 수는 없겠구려. 미안하지만 힘을 내 주시오.

#p2091002# sent you here? Are you really going to join me in eliminating the Red-Nosed Pirates? They are infamous for their ways all over Ossyria. You'll have trouble tackling on the disciples of Lord Pirate... do you still wish to to help me out?

Wow, you're confident. That's very good! Now, I really want you to eliminate #r#o7130104#s#k and bring back #b20 #t4031436#s#k. Looking through the trails left on the ship, this theft can only be blamed on one thing, #o7130104#. It'll be of great help to this town you can defeat it.
I would really love to go, but if I do, and the freight gets ambushed again, then I really would regret it for a while. I can't leave here... good luck!
True. Decisions based on courage may be noble, but it's better to stay quiet every once in a while.
You really did eliminate #o7130104# and brought back #t4031436#! This is incredible. #o7130104#, I'm sure, was a formidable presence, but... this is unbelievable!

Thank you very much. Since you did your work defeating #o7130104#, I'll stay here and take care of the rest. Only this will make me feel less guilty about the haircut and others. Anyway, thank you so much for your great help!
Have you not defeated #r#o7130104##k, yet? I see... I know it's not going to be easy defeating #o7130104# and collecting #b20 #t4031436#s#k along the way.
